title: PageResponse
description: Pagination wrapper used inside ApiResponse.data for list endpoints. Java: PageResponse<T>. All implementations MUST use 1-based page numbering.

items.description: Array of items for the current page

page.description: Current page number (1-based). Java converts Spring Data 0-based to 1-based.

size.description: Number of items per page (requested page size)

totalElements.description: Total number of items across all pages
